panels.description: Free disk space on the DB volume. Less than a few GiBs, it's a problem.
panels.title: Free Disk Space

panels.description: Successes / (Successes + Errors)

targets.expr: sum by (job, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(diem_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{job=~"$job", result="Ok"}[1m])) / sum by (job, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(diem_storage_api_latency_seconds_count[1m]))

panels.title: DiemDB API Success Rate

panels.description: This reflects the IO performance of the underlying device.

targets.expr: sum by (job, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(diem_schemadb_get_latency_seconds_sum{job=~"$job"}[1m])) / sum by (job, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(diem_schemadb_get_latency_seconds_count[1m]))

panels.title: SchemaDB get() latency
DiemDB API Success Rate by api_name

panels.description: Successes / (Successes + Errors)

targets.expr: sum by (job, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(diem_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{job=~"$job", result="Ok", api_name=~"$api_name"}[1m])) / sum by (job, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(diem_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{api_name=~"$api_name"}[1m]))

panels.title: OVERALL

targets.expr: sum by (job, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(diem_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{job=~"$job", result="Ok", api_name="$api_name"}[1m])) / sum by (job, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(diem_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{api_name="$api_name"}[1m]))

panels.description: api $api_name latency
panels.title: $api_name
DiemDB API Call per Second by api_name
DiemDB API Error per Second by api_name
SchemaDB get() per Second by cf_name
SchemaDB get() Bytes per Second by cf_name
SchemaDB iterator next() Latency by cf_name
SchemaDB iterator next() per Second by cf_name
SchemaDB iterator next() Bytes per Second by cf_name

panels.description:
"Pruned-till" version is the first version that's readable, but named such for simplicity.

"Committed" version is the version on the latest ledger info saved.

"Synced" version is the version on the latest transaction saved, it's only different when state-sync is working to catch up with peers.
panels.title: Committed, Synced and Pruned-till Versions

panels.description: On the version that wraps up an epoch, the "next block epoch" is the current epoch plus one.
panels.title: Next Block Epoch
Jellyfish Tree Disk Size vs Calculated Size
Number of Accounts vs Internal Nodes
Avg Column Family Size By Name
Record size (key + value) by Column Family
Avg Internal Node Updates per Account Update

panels.description: Right edge of the graph shows latest state of the restore job and when it entered such state.

targets.expr:
diem_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s{job=~"$job"} * 1000
unless diem_db_restore_coordinator_succeed_timestamp_s > diem_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s
unless diem_db_restore_coordinator_fail_timestamp_s > diem_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s

# any restore activity:
and (rate(diem_db_restore_epoch_ending_epoch[1m]) > 0 or rate(diem_db_restore_state_snapshot_leaf_index[1m]) > 0 or rate(diem_db_restore_transaction_save_version[1m]) > 0 or rate(diem_db_restore_transaction_replay_version[1m]) > 0) == bool 1

panels.title: Job State

panels.description:
save: Version of txn being saved without replaying
replay: Version of txn being replayed
target: When "replay" hits this version, the restore is done.
panels.title: Transaction Restore Progress

panels.description:
"Committed" version is the version on the latest ledger info saved.

"Synced" version is the version on the latest transaction saved, it's only different when state-sync is working to catch up with peers.
panels.title: Committed and Synced Versions

panels.description: When the backup coordinator is live, this shows as a upward trend line.
panels.title: Backup Coordinator Heartbeats
Epoch Ending Backup: Epoch vs Latest Epoch

panels.description: State version of the snapshot being taken, compared to latest version of the ledger.
panels.title: State Snapshot: Version vs Latest Version

panels.description: Note the number of accounts is the latest, not that at specified version.
panels.title: State snapshot: Progress vs Total Accounts
Transaction Backup: Version vs latest version

panels.description: Right edge of the graph shows latest state of the backup-verify job and when it entered such state.

targets.expr:
diem_db_backup_verify_coordinator_start_timestamp_s{job=~"$job"} * 1000
unless diem_db_backup_verify_coordinator_succeed_timestamp_s > diem_db_backup_verify_coordinator_start_timestamp_s
unless diem_db_backup_verify_coordinator_fail_timestamp_s > diem_db_backup_verify_coordinator_start_timestamp_s

# any restore activity:
and (rate(diem_db_backup_verify_epoch_ending_epoch[1m]) > 0 or rate(diem_db_backup_verify_state_snapshot_leaf_index[1m]) > 0 or rate(diem_db_backup_verify_transaction_version[1m]) > 0)
